attributes.action: ripoff imports not up to ISO or British standerds
attributes.additional_details:
The British public are been riped off by cheap imports that are not up to ISO or British standards.
from patio furniture, electronics, clothing, tools, tents, Just a few of the very poorly made goods that are now on sale in the UK if government allows these substandard goods to be imported then we the British public think they are OK to buy.
The British standards association needs to get involved with customs and stop this rubbish been put on sale in the UK.
